appsGate.lig.manager.client.communication.service.subscribe
Interface ListenerService

All Known Implementing Classes:
ClientCommunicationManager
public interface ListenerService

This interface is the specification of service for subscribe notification, message and command response to client application.

Since:
February 8, 2013
Version:
1.0.0
Author:
Cédric Gérard

Method Summary
 boolean addCommandListener(CommandListener cmdListener)
          This method allow all the caller to subscribe for all commands and events except configuration command.
 boolean addConfigListener(java.lang.String target, ConfigListener configListener)
          This method allow the caller to subscribe for all configuration command.
 boolean removeConfigListener(java.lang.String target)
          This method allow the caller to unsubscribe the specify target for all configuration command.
 

Method Detail

addCommandListener

boolean addCommandListener(CommandListener cmdListener)
This method allow all the caller to subscribe for all commands and events except configuration command.

Parameters:
cmdListener - the listener for subscription
Returns:
true if the listener is registered, false otherwise

addConfigListener

boolean addConfigListener(java.lang.String target,
                          ConfigListener configListener)
This method allow the caller to subscribe for all configuration command.

Parameters:
target - the target identifier
configListener - the listener for subscription
Returns:
true if the listener is registered, false otherwise

removeConfigListener

boolean removeConfigListener(java.lang.String target)
This method allow the caller to unsubscribe the specify target for all configuration command.

Parameters:
target - the target identifier
Returns:
true if the listener is unregistered, false otherwise
